subject: From Mrs. Ali  Melissa Fatima
body:
From Mrs. Ali  Melissa Fatima
Hello  Beloved  One Mr. Rupert,
How are you and your family doing today? Really from the content of your message, I understood that your very good and honest person. Surely, I'm not just wake up and picked you in this transaction, Rather I did a lot of research before I was moved to choose you in this task. Again, it doesn't matter your Religion, what I need is Honest and Truth-worthy person. And I have find that in you. Concerning your Question, You can chose any orphanages Home around you and do the work.

Kindly gives me your heart and mine will be giving to you, so that both of us will work Hand to Hand and achieve our common goal as one family.

Really, all over the country today, including mine and yours, there is good and bad people, I promise you from the bottom of my Heart, that this CHARITABLE (WORKS) will never ever land or put you in any Problem. This  is legal and %100 Genuine. I will definitely provide all the legal documents of this Fund and paid them.

Well, am still in the Istanbul General Hospital here taking treatment because of my Cancer. but am getting better gradually.

Finally, I will like to have your full details including, Such as your full name,
cell phone number for more re-cognization and mine will be giving to you in my next message.

So, that I will use it to prepared an authorization letter which will empower you as a rightful own of this Fund.

Kindly let me know your mindset concern this Task, so that I will disclose more details to you.
Thanks
Yours Affectionately,
Mrs.Ali Melissa Fatima
+905359356874

subject: Re: From Mrs. Ali  Melissa Fatima
body:
Hello Mrs. Melissa Fatima,

I hope this message finds you well and in good spirits despite your current health situation. I'm glad to hear that you're getting better gradually, and I pray for your speedy recovery.

It's heartwarming to know that you have such a charitable spirit, wanting to help orphanages. It's indeed a noble cause. However, I'm curious about how you found me and why you chose me for this task? 

Also, could you please provide more details about the fund? How does it work? And what would be my role exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rupert

subject: Mrs.Ali Melissa Fatima
body:
Mrs. Ali Melissa Fatima Membership in
Turkish Parliament Association
Tell: +905356520176

My Beloved one Mr.Rupert,
Many thanks for your response and is my pleasure to hear from you, listen my dear, I believe in you and I know that we are now into mutual relationship and I write to inform you that this transfer is 100% risk free, everything about this transfer is legal, My Banker will prepare all necessary documents that will back up the transaction to your account. please, contact my Banker and Again, .I need honest from you and fear not , you will never regret to assist me.

I had a meeting with My Banker, He called me on phone, base on how to handle this transfer to your account without any delay, we agreed that you will be in position of 40% of the total sum and I want you to know that with My Banker safety and success transfer is guaranteed, I will advise you to contact him to enable us proceed immediately. Here is deposit certificate and my Membership ID'S.

See the Bank contact details below:

Name: Mr. Dr. Ahmet GENÇ.
Ziraat Bank Credit Manager.
International Transfer Services
Email: ( info-ZiraatBank-officee@europe.com)
D/L Line +905524537468
Whaps Line +905524537468

Contact person: Mr. Dr. Ahmet GENÇ.. Ext 110

Please tell him that your partner Mrs. Ali Melissa Fatima. Instructed you to contact him on how to proceed immediately, and My banker said that the transfer will not take more than four working days as soon as we comply with the requirements, if possible you call him on phone and send him an email to show our seriousness in this transaction. Please I want you to keep this transaction confidential at all time for security reasons. Until the Fund enters inside your account.

What I want you to do is for you to take proper care of my son. Again, Am too big to fool myself in the internet whatever am doing with you is 100% Risk free and straight forward please.


Thanks and have a nice day,
MRS. Ali Melissa Fatima,

subject: Re: From Mrs. Ali  Melissa Fatima
body:
Hello Mrs. Melissa Fatima,

I hope this message finds you well and in good spirits despite your current health situation. I'm glad to hear that you're getting better gradually, and I pray for your speedy recovery.

It's heartwarming to know that you have such a noble intention of helping orphanages. It's indeed a great cause and I appreciate your efforts towards it. However, I must say that I am not in a position to provide my personal details at this point.

Could you please share more about the charitable works you mentioned? How did you come across this fund and what made you decide to use it for charity? Also, could you tell me more about the legal documents related to the fund?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rupert

subject: Re: From Mrs. Ali  Melissa Fatima
body:
Hello Mrs. Melissa Fatima,

I hope this message finds you well and in good spirits despite your current health situation. I'm glad to hear that you're getting better gradually, and I pray for your speedy recovery.

It's heartwarming to know that you have such a noble intention of helping orphanages. It's indeed a great cause and I appreciate your efforts towards it. However, I must admit that I'm not very familiar with the process of handling such large funds or how to go about distributing them to orphanages.

Could you please guide me through the process? What are the steps involved? And what kind of legal documents would be required?

Also, while I understand the need for trust in this endeavor, I am a bit hesitant about sharing my personal details over email due to privacy concerns. Is there any other way we can proceed without sharing sensitive information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rupert

subject: Mrs. Fatima Melissa
body:
Hello Mr. Rupert,
  How are you and your family doing today, your message is well noted but I do understand that you're havinga double mind to assist me by repeating questions you asked previously.
Note: I have resend it again to you, so that you can contact my Bank that will assist us to transfer the Fundto you. Please dear, this is %100 genuine Fund which will never ever put you in any Trouble.
Again, if you're not willing to assist in this Charitable work,  good and fine, you can stop ok.
This Fund {$30.5million US Dollars} belongs to I and my late Husband Late Dr. Bernard Ali, he died duringCovid 19 ,  not only this Fund, we have a lot of properties, Gold and Silver ok.  
So let me know, your mindset concerning this WORK ok.
ThanksYours Faithfully,Mrs. Fatima Melissa

subject: Re: Mrs.Ali Melissa Fatima
body:
Hello Mrs. Ali Melissa Fatima,

Thank you for your message and the trust you've placed in me. It's an honor to be considered for such a task.

I understand that this transfer is risk-free and legal, as you mentioned. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please provide more details about the nature of this transfer? What exactly does it entail?

Also, could you tell me more about your son? How old is he and what are his interests? I would like to know more so I can ensure his well-being.

Lastly, regarding contacting your banker, could you please clarify which method of communication he prefers? You mentioned both phone and email but didn't provide any contact details.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rupert

subject: Re: Mrs. Fatima Melissa
body:
Hello Fatima Melissa,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about your late husband, Dr. Bernard Ali. It must be a difficult time for you.

You mentioned a charitable work that involves a fund in US Dollars, gold, and silver. Could you please provide more details about this? What kind of charity is it? How will the funds be used?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rupert

subject: Re: Mrs. Fatima Melissa
body:
Hello Fatima Melissa,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about your late husband, Dr. Bernard Ali. It must be a difficult time for you.

You mentioned charitable work, could you please elaborate more on that? What kind of charitable work are we talking about here? And how exactly can I assist in this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rupert

subject: Re: Mrs. Fatima Melissa
body:
Hello Fatima Melissa,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about your late husband, Dr. Bernard Ali. It must be a challenging time for you.

You mentioned charitable work, which piqued my interest. Could you please elaborate more on the nature of this work? What kind of assistance are you seeking?

Also, it's intriguing that you mentioned gold and silver. Are these assets related to the charitable work in any way?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rupert
